SELECT PATINDEX('%s%', LOWER(DB_NAME()))
SELECT SOUNDEX(DB_NAME())
SELECT DIFFERENCE(DB_NAME(), 'Test')
SELECT QUOTENAME(DB_NAME())
SELECT FORMAT(GETDATE(), 'yyyy-MM-dd') + '|' + DB_NAME()
SELECT CONCAT_WS('|', DB_NAME(), CURRENT_USER, @@SERVERNAME)
SELECT STRING_AGG(name, ',') FROM sys.databases
SELECT STRING_SPLIT(CONCAT(DB_NAME(), ',', CURRENT_USER), ',')
SELECT JSON_VALUE('{"db":"' + DB_NAME() + '"}', '$.db')
SELECT TRY_CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), DB_NAME())
SELECT TRIM('' FROM '' + DB_NAME() + '')
SELECT IIF(ISDATE(GETDATE()) = 1, DB_NAME(), 'Error')
SELECT COALESCE(NULLIF(DB_NAME(), ''), 'Empty')
SELECT CHOOSE(1, DB_NAME(), CURRENT_USER, @@SERVERNAME)
SELECT IIF(DB_NAME() LIKE '%t%', DB_NAME(), 'No T')
SELECT TRANSLATE(DB_NAME(), 'AEI', '123')
SELECT STRING_ESCAPE(DB_NAME(), 'json')
SELECT CONCAT(LEFT(DB_NAME(), 3), '...', RIGHT(DB_NAME(), 3))
SELECT REPLICATE(LEFT(DB_NAME(), 1), 5)
SELECT SPACE(5) + DB_NAME() + SPACE(5)
SELECT 'DB-' + CAST(DB_NAME() AS VARCHAR(50))
SELECT CONVERT(VARBINARY(50), DB_NAME())
SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), CONNECTIONPROPERTY('protocol_type'))
SELECT CASE DB_NAME() WHEN 'master' THEN 'Main' ELSE 'Other' END
SELECT SERVERPROPERTY('IsIntegratedSecurityOnly')
SELECT @@SPID
SELECT @@LOCK_TIMEOUT
SELECT @@MAX_CONNECTIONS
SELECT @@TRANCOUNT
SELECT FULLTEXTSERVICEPROPERTY('IsFullTextInstalled')
SELECT SERVERPROPERTY('IsClustered')
SELECT DATABASEPROPERTYEX(DB_NAME(), 'Status')
SELECT DATABASEPROPERTYEX(DB_NAME(), 'Recovery')
SELECT DATABASEPROPERTYEX(DB_NAME(), 'Updateability')
SELECT OBJECT_ID('sys.databases')
SELECT APP_NAME()
SELECT CONTEXT_INFO()
SELECT SESSION_USER
SELECT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
SELECT CONNECTIONPROPERTY('client_net_address')
SELECT CONNECTIONPROPERTY('auth_scheme')
SELECT ORIGINAL_DB_NAME()
SELECT SCHEMA_NAME()
SELECT SCHEMA_ID()
SELECT DB_ID()
SELECT FILE_NAME(1)
SELECT FILE_IDEX(1)
SELECT FILEGROUP_NAME(1)
SELECT FILEGROUP_ID('PRIMARY')
SELECT FILEPROPERTYEX(1, 'LogicalName')
SELECT TYPEPROPERTY(DB_NAME(), 'PRECISION')
SELECT TYPEPROPERTY(DB_NAME(), 'SCALE')
SELECT TYPEPROPERTY(DB_NAME(), 'COLLATION')
SELECT OBJECT_NAME(OBJECT_ID('sys.databases'))
SELECT OBJECTPROPERTY(OBJECT_ID('sys.databases'), 'BaseType')
SELECT OBJECTPROPERTYEX(OBJECT_ID('sys.databases'), 'IsTable')
SELECT COL_LENGTH('sys.databases', 'name')
SELECT COL_NAME(OBJECT_ID('sys.databases'), 1)
SELECT INDEX_COL('sys.databases', 1, 1)
SELECT INDEXPROPERTY(OBJECT_ID('sys.databases'), 'PK__sysdata__', 'IndexDepth')
SELECT STATS_DATE(OBJECT_ID('sys.databases'), 1)
SELECT DATABASEPROPERTYEX(DB_NAME(), 'Collation')
SELECT DATABASEPROPERTYEX(DB_NAME(), 'Edition')
SELECT DATABASEPROPERTYEX(DB_NAME(), 'IsAutoShrink')
SELECT DATABASEPROPERTYEX(DB_NAME(), 'IsAutoCreateStatistics')

SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), HASHBYTES('SHA2_256', DB_NAME()), 2)
SELECT CONCAT('Server: ', @@SERVERNAME, ' | DB: ', DB_NAME())
SELECT JSON_MODIFY('{}', '$.database', DB_NAME())
SELECT TRIM(TRANSLATE(DB_NAME(), 'AEIOU', '_____'))
SELECT IIF(DB_NAME() = 'master', 'Main Database', 'Other: ' + DB_NAME())
